meanings.definition: Identical copies or instances of something.
meanings.sent1: I found duplicates of my favorite book at the library.
meanings.sent2: The store had duplicates of the same toy on sale.
meanings.sent3: It was funny to see duplicates of my friend's outfit at the party.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with duplicates of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The duplicates of the painting were so well-made, it was hard to tell them apart.

meanings.definition: To make an identical copy of something.
meanings.sent1: She duplicates important documents for safekeeping.
meanings.sent2: The artist duplicates his artwork to sell more pieces.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally duplicates his email and sends it twice.
meanings.sent4: The machine duplicates keys with precision.
meanings.sent5: The chef duplicates the recipe to share with others.

meanings.definition: To be or produce a copy of something.
meanings.sent1: The printer duplicates the report for each team member.
meanings.sent2: The software duplicates files to ensure data safety.
meanings.sent3: The student duplicates the experiment to confirm the results.
meanings.sent4: The factory duplicates the design to create more products.
meanings.sent5: The musician duplicates the melody to create harmony in the song.
